column4: Hi, does Ubuntu have a amount limit of folders in same directory ? (i woule like to create 300,000 folders under same path) ?
I think that's more an issue with the underlying filesystem
sorry i didnt understand .. i am new to Ubuntu, does it possible to create 300,000 folders in same location ?
I think it might be a bad idea due to a) being slow to browse, which may or may not be an issue, and b) inode limits
